name: Cubattles (Pospec, Jonulz)
description:
Controls

Rotate your cube with WASD or Arrow Keys

Game Mechanics

Your goal is to defeat your enemies.
You have limited time to rotate your cube to desired position.
Once time runs out, each player shoots dots on current side of his dice.
When you have dots in same position as your foe, they canel out.
Then you lose your dots at that side. If dot hits dice, the dice loses one live.

Only way to return dots to your dice is to quess what your foe will have next turn.
You have to hoose and click at one quess card.
Icon at the down of the quess card registers what value will be returned to your cube.

Credits

Game Design and Music: Jonáš Smrčka
Game and Coding: Jan Pospíšil
Sounds: Karolína Pospíšilová

Reviews

"Midblowing dice wars" - Vukas Limr 2022
